Hi!

My name is Daniela and I like to design easy to use interfaces and experiences.

About Me

I am a Junior User Experience Designer with a background in Graphic Design. I have just completed a 10 week immersive user experience program with General Assembly.

I am passionate about human psychology, technology and love to innovate and create. I am looking for a position that will allow me to develop my skills and give me a chance to contribute good user experiences in the digital world.

Posse

Website

The brief was to create a seamless user experience focused around "Ultimate Discovery"

My Role:Ideation, presentation and clickable prototype

Transport NSW

Mobile App

The aim was to increase ridership and change the perceived value of public transport via a mobile app

My Role:Team co-ordination, survey and acting as a generalist

Magic Toy Shop

E-commerce Website

Replicating the 'magical' in-store experience in a digital space.

My Role:Solo project - completed from start to finish
